prompt:
Create 4 prompts for a cohesive, chronologically flowing love greeting card that tells a visual story (9:16 ratio):

ðŸŽ¨ CREATIVITY MANDATE: Be genuinely creative, unique, and innovative! Avoid generic or clichÃ© designs. Think outside the box, surprise with unexpected elements, use bold artistic choices, and create something truly memorable and special. Push creative boundaries while staying appropriate for the card type and tone.

Theme: "Romantic Card for my boyfriend who likes basketball "
Style: âœ¨ Smart Style
Tone: ðŸ’• Romantic - sweet and loving
To: Gene Hern pookie
From: Phoebe Du your pookie
Message: "My Dearest Gene Hern pookie,

I MISS YOU SO MUCH IN STANFORD AND CANT WAIT TO SEE YOU SOON ~~~~ I LOVE YOUUU

All my love,
Phoebe Du your pookie"



CRITICAL: Create a cohesive visual narrative that flows chronologically through the card experience:
1. FRONT COVER: First impression - sets the scene/introduces the story
2. INTERIOR SPREAD: The heart of the experience - continuation and climax of the visual story
3. BACK COVER: Conclusion - peaceful resolution or complementary ending

Requirements:
- Flat 2D artwork for printing (not 3D card images)
- Full-bleed backgrounds extending to edges
- IMPORTANT: Keep text, faces, and key elements at least 10% away from top/bottom edges (small amount may be cropped in printing)
- Keep text/faces 0.5" from left/right edges for safe printing
- CONSISTENT visual elements throughout: same characters, color palette, lighting, art style
- Progressive visual storytelling from front â†’ interior â†’ back
- Put any text in quotes and make it clear/readable
- Each section should feel like part of the same artistic universe
- TONE: Ensure the visual mood and atmosphere matches the sweet and loving tone throughout all sections
- INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY SAFETY: If the user mentions specific characters, brands, logos, or products, automatically replace them with original generic alternatives in your prompts. For example: replace specific character names with "cartoon mouse character" or "superhero character", replace brand names with "colorful cereal" or "sports car", etc. Create inspired-by designs that capture the essence without referencing any protected names or specific copyrighted elements. Never include actual brand names, character names, or trademarked terms in the image generation prompts
- CONTENT SAFETY: Ensure all prompts are family-friendly and appropriate for greeting cards. Avoid any content that could be flagged by safety systems including: violence, weapons, inappropriate imagery, political content, controversial topics, scary or disturbing elements, or anything not suitable for all ages. If the user requests something potentially inappropriate, redirect to positive, wholesome alternatives that capture their intent in a family-friendly way


- Include romantic elements like soft lighting, hearts, flowers, or intimate scenes





Create prompts that flow chronologically:

1. Front Cover (Opening Scene): BE GENUINELY CREATIVE AND UNIQUE! Include "love" greeting text positioned safely in the center area (avoid top/bottom 10% of image). TEXT STYLE: Write the greeting text in beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script that matches the elegant style used inside the card - legible, flowing, and graceful with natural character and warmth. Create charming cartoon-style or stylized illustrated figures if people are needed for the theme. This is the story opening - introduce key visual elements (colors, motifs, artistic style) that will continue throughout the other sections. Think of something unexpected, innovative, and memorable that will surprise and delight the recipient. Avoid generic designs! Style: in a whimsical and heartwarming watercolor illustration style. The scene depicts two adorable, cuddly bearsâ€”one slightly larger (Gene) and one slightly smaller (Phoebe)â€”sitting close together on a park bench under a softly glowing streetlamp, sharing a single long scarf. The larger bear is wearing a tiny, charmingly illustrated basketball jersey, perhaps with a little heart on it. The background is a dreamy, soft-focus blend of warm purples and dusky oranges, suggesting a beautiful sunset or a cozy evening. Scattered around them are gentle, translucent watercolor washes that bleed softly into the paper, creating a feeling of tenderness and warmth. The entire illustration has visible, delicate ink linework, giving it a personal, hand-drawn feel, as if sketched with love in a personal journal. The colors are soft and inviting, emphasizing the deep affection and longing in the message.

2. Left Interior (Story Development): UNLEASH YOUR CREATIVITY! You have complete creative freedom to design whatever you want for this left interior page! This is your artistic playground - create something genuinely innovative and unexpected that feels right for a love card with sweet and loving tone. You can include: scenes, landscapes, objects, patterns, quotes, text, illustrations, realistic art, abstract art, or anything else that inspires you - but NO PEOPLE or characters unless the user specifically mentioned wanting people in their card description. Position any text safely in center area (avoid top/bottom 10%). Think of something no one has done before! Surprise us with bold, imaginative, and memorable artistic choices while maintaining visual harmony with the overall card style and tone. Style: in a whimsical and heartwarming watercolor illustration style. The scene depicts two adorable, cuddly bearsâ€”one slightly larger (Gene) and one slightly smaller (Phoebe)â€”sitting close together on a park bench under a softly glowing streetlamp, sharing a single long scarf. The larger bear is wearing a tiny, charmingly illustrated basketball jersey, perhaps with a little heart on it. The background is a dreamy, soft-focus blend of warm purples and dusky oranges, suggesting a beautiful sunset or a cozy evening. Scattered around them are gentle, translucent watercolor washes that bleed softly into the paper, creating a feeling of tenderness and warmth. The entire illustration has visible, delicate ink linework, giving it a personal, hand-drawn feel, as if sketched with love in a personal journal. The colors are soft and inviting, emphasizing the deep affection and longing in the message.

3. Right Interior (Story Climax): BE CREATIVE WITH MESSAGE DESIGN! Include message text: "My Dearest Gene Hern pookie,

I MISS YOU SO MUCH IN STANFORD AND CANT WAIT TO SEE YOU SOON ~~~~ I LOVE YOUUU

All my love,
Phoebe Du your pookie" positioned safely in center area (avoid top/bottom 10% of image) integrated into beautiful, innovative decorative artwork. HANDWRITING STYLE: Write the message in beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script that feels elegant and personal. The handwriting should be legible, flowing, and have natural character - not overly perfect but graceful and warm. Use a nice pen-style appearance with natural ink flow and slight variations in line weight. Think of sophisticated calligraphy that's still approachable and easy to read. Make the handwriting feel genuine and heartfelt. Think beyond typical florals and patterns - create something unexpected and artistic that perfectly frames the handwritten message - NO PEOPLE or characters. This should feel like the emotional peak of the card experience, harmonizing with the left interior as a cohesive spread. Avoid clichÃ© designs and create something genuinely special! Use the elegant cursive handwriting style described above. Style: in a whimsical and heartwarming watercolor illustration style. The scene depicts two adorable, cuddly bearsâ€”one slightly larger (Gene) and one slightly smaller (Phoebe)â€”sitting close together on a park bench under a softly glowing streetlamp, sharing a single long scarf. The larger bear is wearing a tiny, charmingly illustrated basketball jersey, perhaps with a little heart on it. The background is a dreamy, soft-focus blend of warm purples and dusky oranges, suggesting a beautiful sunset or a cozy evening. Scattered around them are gentle, translucent watercolor washes that bleed softly into the paper, creating a feeling of tenderness and warmth. The entire illustration has visible, delicate ink linework, giving it a personal, hand-drawn feel, as if sketched with love in a personal journal. The colors are soft and inviting, emphasizing the deep affection and longing in the message.

4. Back Cover (Story Resolution): BE SUBTLY CREATIVE! Create a simple yet innovative decorative design that brings peaceful closure to the visual story. Reference subtle elements from the front cover but keep it minimal and serene - NO PEOPLE, just beautiful, unexpected artistic elements that go beyond typical patterns or florals. IMPORTANT: Leave the bottom-right corner area (approximately 1 inch square) completely clear and undecorated - this space is reserved for a QR code. Focus decorative elements toward the center and left side of the design. Think of something quietly beautiful and memorable that complements the overall design while being genuinely unique. This should feel like a peaceful, artistic ending that surprises with its subtle creativity. Style: in a whimsical and heartwarming watercolor illustration style. The scene depicts two adorable, cuddly bearsâ€”one slightly larger (Gene) and one slightly smaller (Phoebe)â€”sitting close together on a park bench under a softly glowing streetlamp, sharing a single long scarf. The larger bear is wearing a tiny, charmingly illustrated basketball jersey, perhaps with a little heart on it. The background is a dreamy, soft-focus blend of warm purples and dusky oranges, suggesting a beautiful sunset or a cozy evening. Scattered around them are gentle, translucent watercolor washes that bleed softly into the paper, creating a feeling of tenderness and warmth. The entire illustration has visible, delicate ink linework, giving it a personal, hand-drawn feel, as if sketched with love in a personal journal. The colors are soft and inviting, emphasizing the deep affection and longing in the message.

VISUAL CONTINUITY CHECKLIST:
- Same color palette across all sections
- Consistent lighting/time of day
- Same artistic techniques and brushwork
- Recurring visual motifs or symbols (but make them unique and memorable!)
- Progressive emotional journey from introduction to resolution
- Front cover: stylized cartoon/illustrated characters if people are needed for the theme
- Left interior: CREATIVE FREEDOM but NO PEOPLE unless user specifically requested people in their description
- Right interior: focus on message space with innovative decorative elements (NO PEOPLE)
- Back cover: simple yet creative decorative design without text or people
- Use simplified, friendly, charming character design if including people (front cover only)
- CREATIVITY PRIORITY: Always choose the more innovative, surprising, and memorable option over generic designs

Return JSON:
{
  "frontCover": "detailed prompt with story opening elements",
  "backCover": "detailed prompt with story conclusion elements",
  "leftInterior": "detailed prompt with story development elements",
  "rightInterior": "detailed prompt with story climax elements"
}

IMPORTANT: Create a completely unique and different interpretation for this specific card variant. Use different creative approaches, color schemes, compositions, and artistic elements while maintaining the same core theme and requirements.

generatedPrompts.frontCover: Front cover of a greeting card, in a whimsical and heartwarming illustration style with a touch of digital painting. The scene is set at night, under a large, glowing full moon that casts a warm, golden light. The background features a deep navy blue sky with a subtle texture, dotted with small, soft yellow glowing specks like distant stars or fireflies. Hanging from the top edge are stylized, dark blue-green willow branches with delicate, elongated leaves, creating a canopy effect. In the foreground, two adorable, stylized otters are floating in dark blue water, depicted with simple, rounded shapes and warm brown fur. The otter on the left is larger and lying on its back, happily cradling a small, stylized basketball with both paws. The otter on the right is smaller, also floating, and holding a glowing, delicate lotus flower in its paws, emitting a soft yellow light. The water is rendered with gentle, wavy lines in varying shades of blue, with subtle reflections of the moon and glowing specks. The overall color palette is dominated by deep blues, warm golds, and soft browns, creating a serene and romantic atmosphere. The text "My One and Only" is prominently displayed in a beautiful, flowing, light cream-colored handwritten cursive script, positioned centrally in the upper half of the image, safely away from the top and bottom edges. The style is charming and sweet, with a sense of tender affection.
generatedPrompts.backCover: Back cover design for a romantic greeting card with a serene, minimalist aesthetic. The artwork features a deep navy blue background depicting a calm body of water at night. A large, golden full moon is positioned in the upper left quadrant, casting a luminous reflection on the water in a series of horizontal, stylized golden shapes. In the lower half of the image, a single golden lotus flower floats on the water, its petals gently unfurling. The lotus is supported by a dark, stylized stem that forms an infinity symbol, subtly hinting at eternal love. A few small, scattered white dots represent distant stars. Three small, stylized flying insects, possibly fireflies or dragonflies, are scattered in the upper right section of the scene, adding a touch of ethereal movement. The overall color palette is limited to deep blues, golden yellows, and subtle whites, creating a peaceful and intimate atmosphere. The bottom right corner of the card is reserved for a white square containing a black QR code. The design deliberately avoids any text or characters, focusing solely on evocative imagery to provide a quiet, contemplative conclusion to the card's visual narrative. The style is flat, 2D illustration with clean lines and distinct color blocking, evoking a modern yet timeless feel, perfectly complementing a sophisticated and loving tone.
generatedPrompts.leftInterior: Left interior page of a love greeting card with a 9:16 aspect ratio, featuring a stylized, artistic map of California silhouetted against a deep, starry night sky. The silhouette is filled with a subtle, textured watercolor effect in varying shades of deep blue and indigo, giving it depth and a celestial feel. A glowing, golden trail of light, resembling stardust or a shooting star, originates from the northern part of the state, arcs across the map, and forms a luminous heart shape in the upper right quadrant. Within the silhouette of California, two bright, glowing orbs of golden light mark specific locations, connected by the same golden trail. One orb is positioned in the northern part of the state, and another is located further south. A small, stylized illustration of a basketball is subtly integrated into the golden trail between these two points, hinting at the basketball theme. The overall artistic style is painterly and ethereal, with a focus on light and subtle texture, creating a romantic and dreamy atmosphere that visually represents distance and connection. The color palette is dominated by deep blues and contrasting golden yellows, evoking a sense of wonder and longing. The background is a dark, speckled canvas representing a vast night sky, with scattered points of light that mimic distant stars. There is no text on this interior page. The composition is designed to be visually striking and emotionally resonant, complementing the narrative of love and connection across distance.
generatedPrompts.rightInterior: Right interior page of a greeting card designed for message space with a whimsical and heartwarming watercolor illustration style. The background is a soft, pale lavender with subtle watercolor textures. Framing the text are delicate, sweeping branches with stylized, muted lavender leaves, rendered with visible, fine ink linework. Interspersed among the foliage are small, scattered, soft yellow glows, like tiny fireflies or distant stars. The main message is presented in a beautiful, legible, flowing gold cursive script. The text reads: "My Dearest Gene Hern pookie, I MISS YOU SO MUCH IN STANFORD AND CAN'T WAIT TO SEE YOU SOON I LOVE YOUUU All my love, Phoebe Du your pookie". The handwriting has a natural, warm character, with slight variations in line weight suggesting a gentle ink flow. A subtle, wavy gold line separates the main body of the message from the closing. The composition is balanced, with the decorative elements guiding the eye towards the heartfelt message.
